text: The organs of a 32-year-old man were donated, saving the lives of four people. According to a release, the employee of a school met with a road accident and was admitted to Sri Ramachandra Medical Centre on January 17. He was declared brain dead the next day. His father and brother gave consent to donate his organs. The liver was transplanted to a patient from Kerala at the hospital, and the kidneys to two other patients. The heart and lungs went to Global Hospitals.
title: Man’s organs save four lives
